OOC: What is the status of the Blackfortress? How heavily defended 
and what type of external defenses does it have?  Who might be around?

IC:
//Ragnus//

  He wanders, the beast of legend, completely insane in attitude but 
not in knowledge.  Ragnus' tactial mind was devising a plan.  A plan 
to draw out what he's searching for.

  He remembers this area from his time using the decepticon 
database.  This is where the Predacons have set up base.  He knew the 
area, the maps had shown him that. But he didn't know just how he'd 
break in yet.

  He has spent days mapping the area in his mind, using stealth to 
look at the defenses and just plain waiting to see what bots have 
come and gone and to see what the best time to attack would be.
